item.title: Yardeni 称减持 Mag 7，15 年后转向科技领域
item.description: Yardeni Research 公司目前建议，相对于其他 S&P 500 指数成分股，有效减持 "华丽七巨头 "科技股，预计未来盈利增长将发生转变。【原文：Yardeni Research now recommends effectively going underweight the Magnificent Seven megacap technology stocks versus the rest of the S&P 500, expecting a shift in earnings growth ahead.】

item.title: 韩国零售商对韩元下滑的指责 "怒不可遏
item.description: 韩国散户投资者今年创纪录地购买了 310 亿美元的美国股票，这使他们成为韩国货币疲软的替罪羊。他们怒不可遏。【原文：South Korean retail investors’ $31 billion record purchases of US stocks this year have turned them into scapegoats for the country’s weakening currency. They are furious.】

item.title: 日本确认国内生产总值进一步下滑，支持高市刺激政策
item.description: 日本政府在一份修订报告中确认，日本经济在截至 9 月份的三个月中出现萎缩，这为首相高市真奈上个月宣布的经济刺激计划提供了一些理由。【原文：Japan’s economy shrank in the three months through September, the government confirmed in a revised report, giving some justification for Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s stimulus package announced last month.】

item.title: 招聘人员称，英国薪酬增长加速，创五个月新高
item.description: 据英国央行决策者密切关注的一项调查显示，在经历了数月近乎停滞的增长之后，英国的薪资正在回升。【原文：Salaries are picking up in the UK after months of near-stagnation, according to a survey that’s closely watched by the Bank of England policymakers.】

item.title: 白银在创纪录附近徘徊，ETF 投资者为白银涨势再添一把火
item.description: 白银在上一交易日攀升逾 2%后出现震荡，原因是以白银为支撑的交易所交易基金的资金流入创下 7 月份以来最强劲的一周。黄金微涨。【原文：Silver wavered, after climbing more than 2% in the previous session, as inflows to exchange-traded funds backed by the metal had their strongest week since July. Gold edged up.】

item.title: 特朗普警告 Netflix 与华纳的交易可能带来反垄断 "问题
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统对 Netflix 公司收购华纳兄弟发现公司的计划提出了潜在的反垄断问题，指出合并后的实体的市场份额可能会带来问题。【原文：President Donald Trump raised potential antitrust concerns for Netflix Inc.’s planned acquisition of Warner Bros. Discovery Inc., noting that the market share of the combined entity may pose problems.】

item.title: 关注印度购买和乌克兰对俄罗斯的攻击，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 由于交易商关注印度对俄罗斯原油的购买以及乌克兰对其邻国能源基础设施的袭击，石油价格保持稳定。【原文：Oil steadied as traders monitored India’s buying of Russian crude and Ukrainian attacks on its neighbor’s energy infrastructure.】

item.title: 推动阿布扎比全球雄心的万亿美元机器
item.description:
阿布扎比是阿拉伯联合酋长国的首都，深厚的财富使其在全球金融、能源和人工智能领域拥有前所未有的影响力。【原文：

Deep pools of wealth have given Abu Dhabi, the capital of the United Arab Emirates, unprecedented sway over global finance, energy and AI.

】

item.description: 泰德-萨兰多斯在华纳交易前亲自向特朗普示好【原文：Ted Sarandos wooed Trump personally ahead of Warner deal】

item.title: 胜科正在洽谈收购澳大利亚 Alinta 能源公司
item.description: 新加坡胜科工业有限公司（Sembcorp Industries Ltd.）表示，该公司正在洽谈收购澳大利亚公用事业公司 Alinta Energy Pty.【原文：Singapore’s Sembcorp Industries Ltd. said it’s in talks to potentially buy Australian utility Alinta Energy Pty.】

item.title: 进入美联储周，亚洲市场谨慎起步：市场综述
item.description: 周一，亚洲市场谨慎开盘，交易员们将关注日益恶化的中日关系、一系列央行决议以及明年风险资产的更广泛前景。【原文：Asian markets were poised for a cautious open on Monday as traders navigate deteriorating China-Japan relations, a heavy slate of central bank decisions and the broader outlook for risk assets heading into next year.】

item.title: 尽管上田暗示加息，美元兑日元多头仍坚守阵地
item.description: 越来越多的人猜测日本央行将在本月加息，但市场参与者仍在押注日元兑美元将走软。【原文：Speculation is growing that the Bank of Japan is on track to raise interest rates this month but market participants are still betting that the yen will weaken against the dollar.】

item.title: Altice International 要求债权人发送合作协议副本
item.description: 据彭博社看到的一封信称，Altice International 已要求一组有担保债权人发送一份合作协议副本，该协议约束他们在开始任何可能的资产负债表重组讨论之前，共同与公司进行谈判。【原文：Altice International has asked a group of secured creditors to send a copy of the cooperation agreement that binds them to act together in negotiations with the company before starting any potential discussions to restructure its balance sheet, according to a letter seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 债券交易员挑战美联储，引发华尔街激烈争论
item.description: 债券市场对美联储降息的反应极不寻常。至少在这一点上，华尔街达成了广泛共识。从某种程度上说，自 20 世纪 90 年代以来，像这种央行降息而国债收益率攀升的脱节现象还从未出现过。【原文：The bond market’s reaction to the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate cuts has been highly unusual. On that point, at least, there is broad agreement on Wall Street. By some measures, a disconnect like this, with Treasury yields climbing as the central bank lowers rates, hasn’t been seen since the 1990s.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表称中国已遵守贸易协议条款
item.description: 贸易代表杰米森-格里尔说，中国一直在遵守双边贸易协定的条款，美国正在不断监督中国做出的承诺，以保持稳定的贸易关系。【原文：Trade Representative Jamieson Greer said China has been complying with the terms of the bilateral trade agreements and that the US is constantly monitoring commitments made by China in a bid to maintain a stable trade relationship.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行将再次维持利率不变，市场关注鹰派转向
item.description: 澳大利亚央行准备在连续第三次会议上维持利率不变，交易员和经济学家对任何转向鹰派的基调保持警惕，这可能预示着明年加息的可能性。【原文：Australia’s central bank is poised to keep interest rates unchanged for a third straight meeting, with traders and economists on alert for any shift toward a more hawkish tone that might signal the possibility of hikes next year.】

item.title: Netflix 的萨兰多斯在竞购华纳之前亲自向特朗普示好
item.description: Netflix Inc. 联席首席执行官泰德-萨兰多斯（Ted Sarandos）于 11 月中旬前往白宫与唐纳德-特朗普总统会面。据熟悉此次会面的人士透露，在一个多小时的时间里，两人讨论了一系列话题，其中包括华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Netflix Inc. co-Chief Executive Officer Ted Sarandos ventured to the White House in mid-November for a meeting with President Donald Trump. Over more than an hour, the two discussed a range of topics, including the auction of Warner Bros. Discovery Inc., according to people familiar with the interaction.】

item.title: 监管机构称，2026 年阿尔及利亚将最多再有三家公司进行首次公开募股
item.description: 据当地监管机构称，阿尔及利亚证券交易所明年将有两到三家公司进行首次公开募股，其中包括一家寻求为数据中心融资的 IT 公司 Ayrade。【原文：Algeria’s stock exchange will see two or three initial public offerings next year, including Ayrade, an IT company that’s seeking to finance data centers, according to the local regulator.】

item.title: 马克龙呼吁重新思考欧洲央行如何对待货币政策
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）呼吁欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）改变货币政策，以促进单一市场的发展并保护其免受金融危机的风险。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron called for a change in approach to monetary policy at the European Central Bank to boost the single market and protect it from the risks of financial crisis.】

item.title: 美联储库克的命运与最高法院审理特朗普解雇案息息相关
item.description: 美国最高法院周一的一场辩论可能会为美联储理事丽莎-库克的命运提供线索，唐纳德-特朗普总统在推动加强对中央银行的控制时曾试图解雇库克。【原文：A US Supreme Court argument Monday is likely to provide clues about the fate of Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook, whom President Donald Trump has tried to fire in his push for more control over the central bank.】

item.title: 白银、铜超越黄金成为供应担忧下的顶级金属赌注
item.description: 进入 2026 年，白银和铜已取代黄金成为热门金属交易品种，机构和零售交易商都在为创纪录的涨势做准备。【原文：Silver and copper have replaced gold as the hot metal trade heading into 2026, with institutional and retail traders positioning for record rallies.】

item.title: 据说布鲁克菲尔德和 GIC 接近就 National Storage 提出具有约束力的收购要约
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理有限公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. ）和新加坡GIC私人有限公司（GIC Pte）即将对National Storage REIT提出具有约束力的收购要约，这笔交易可能会使这家在悉尼上市的公司估值达到约40亿澳元（约合27亿美元）。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. and Singapore’s GIC Pte are nearing a binding offer for National Storage REIT in a deal that may value the Sydney-listed company at about A$4 billion ($2.7 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 人工智能风险加剧，OpenAI 从股市救世主变成负担
item.description: 华尔街对人工智能相关公司的看法正在发生变化，而这一切都与两家公司有关：OpenAI 下跌，Alphabet 公司上涨。【原文：Wall Street’s sentiment toward companies associated with artificial intelligence is shifting, and it’s all about two companies: OpenAI is down, and Alphabet Inc. is up.】

item.title: 大气河将在本周五淹没西北太平洋地区
item.description: 一场被称为 "大气河 "的巨大太平洋风暴将从下周一开始从海洋席卷到西北太平洋地区，给包括西雅图和波特兰在内的整个地区带来暴雨和为期一周的洪水、河水暴涨甚至大雪。【原文：A massive Pacific storm called an atmospheric river will sweep off the ocean into the Pacific Northwest starting Monday, bringing heavy rain and a week of floods, swollen rivers and even heavy snow across the region, including Seattle and Portland.】

item.title: 博尔索纳罗的天命之子在 2026 年巴西大选中面临与卢拉的艰苦斗争
item.description: 弗拉维奥-博尔索纳罗似乎从来都不是继承其父政治衣钵的最佳人选，即使在前总统雅伊尔-博尔索纳罗因企图政变而身陷囹圄并被排除在 2026 年巴西大选之外的时候也是如此。【原文：Flavio Bolsonaro never appeared the likeliest choice to inherit his father’s political mantle, even when former President Jair Bolsonaro was thrown behind bars and ruled out of Brazil’s 2026 election for attempting a coup.】

item.title: 什么泡沫？资产经理在风险模式下坚持投资股票
item.description: 投资总有走到尽头的时候，谨慎的做法是套现离场。对于已经连续三年在股票市场取得两位数涨幅的全球资产管理公司来说，现在还不是时候。【原文：There’s a time when investments run their course and the prudent move is to cash out. For global asset managers who’ve ridden double-digit gains in equities for three straight years, that time is not now.】

item.title: 马克龙警告欧盟可能因贸易顺差对中国征收关税
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）警告说，如果中国政府不能解决与欧盟之间不断扩大的贸易失衡问题，欧盟可能被迫对中国采取 "强硬措施"，包括可能征收关税。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron warned that the European Union may be forced to take “strong measures” against China, including potential tariffs, if Beijing fails to address its widening trade imbalance with the bloc.】

item.title: 投资者在辉煌的一年后加倍看好前沿市场
item.description: 由于投资者对经济复苏持乐观态度，主权违约风险降低，前沿市场可能会将其令人印象深刻的涨势延续到明年。【原文：Frontier markets will likely extend their impressive rally into next year, thanks to investor optimism about economic recovery and reduced risks of sovereign defaults.】

item.title: 法国经济部长莱斯库尔称今年经济将至少增长 0.8
item.description: 法国财政部长罗兰-莱斯库雷（Roland Lescure）周日表示，法国经济很可能在2025年实现至少0.8%的增长，略高于政府预测的0.7%。【原文：The French economy will likely achieve growth of at least 0.8% in 2025, slightly ahead of the government’s 0.7% forecast, Finance Minister Roland Lescure said on Sunday.】

item.title: 卡塔尔航空公司任命新首席执行官，阿尔梅尔两年后离职
item.description: 卡塔尔航空集团（Qatar Airways Group）任命哈马德-阿里-哈特（Hamad Ali Al-Khater）为新任集团首席执行官，这是该集团在巴德尔-穆罕默德-米尔（Badr Mohammed Al-Meer）任职两年后的一次意外调整。【原文：Qatar Airways Group named Hamad Ali Al‑Khater as its new group chief executive officer in a surprise shakeup, succeeding Badr Mohammed Al-Meer after just two years in the post.】
